thread.title: This homemade bungee jump for Channel 4's Experimental is the most terrifying thing you'll see - TV
thread.title_full: This homemade bungee jump for Channel 4's Experimental is the most terrifying thing you'll see - TV News - Digital Spy

author: Tasha Hegarty
title: This homemade bungee jump for Channel 4's Experimental is the most terrifying thing you'll see - TV
text: Experimental should definitely come with a "don't try this at home" warning.The Channel 4 show has released a clip from an upcoming episode that involves a homemade bungee jump - and it looks terrifying.The series follows engineer Tim Shaw and his friend Buddy Munro, who trawl through the internet's craziest videos before recreating the unbelievable stunts.Throughout the series, the pair take some breathtaking risks, as they try to discover the scientific truth behind a host of different challenges.Viewers will see Novak Djokovic playing tennis on the wing of a plane, before finding out what happens when you drop 7,000 mints into 1,000 litres of cola.The next episode airs this Sunday (October 11) at 10pm on Channel 4.
